verses.verse: Forasmuch then as <S%G3767><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> suffered3958, 5228, 2257 in the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, arm <S%G3695><s%> ye yourselves <S%G5210><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> with the same <S%G846><s%> mind <S%G1771><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> he that hath suffered <S%G3958><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> hath ceased <S%G3973><s%> from sin <S%G266><s%>;

that <S%G1519><s%> ye <S%G980><s%> no longer <S%G3371><s%> should live <S%G980><s%> the rest <S%G1954><s%> of <S%G5550><s%> your time <S%G5550><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> to the lusts <S%G1939><s%> of men <S%G444><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G5550><s%> past3928, 979 may suffice713, 2254 to have wrought <S%G2716><s%> the desire <S%G2307><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%>, and to have walked <S%G4198><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> lasciviousness <S%G766><s%>, lusts <S%G1939><s%>, winebibbings <S%G3632><s%>, revellings <S%G2970><s%>, carousings <S%G4224><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> abominable <S%G111><s%> idolatries <S%G1495><s%>:

wherein1722, 3739 they think it strange <S%G3579><s%> that ye <S%G5216><s%> run <S%G4936><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> with <S%G1519><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> the same <S%G846><s%> excess <S%G401><s%> of riot <S%G810><s%>, speaking evil of you <S%G987><s%>:

who <S%G3739><s%> shall give <S%G591><s%> account <S%G3056><s%> to him that is <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to judge <S%G2919><s%> the living <S%G2198><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dead <S%G3498><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> this end <S%G5124><s%> was the gospel preached <S%G2097><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> to the dead <S%G3498><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> they might be judged <S%G2919><s%> indeed according to <S%G2596><s%> men <S%G444><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, but <S%G1161><s%> live <S%G2198><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in the spirit <S%G4151><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> the end <S%G5056><s%> of all things <S%G3956><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>: be ye <S%G4993><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> of sound mind <S%G3525><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> be sober <S%G4993><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> prayer <S%G4335><s%>:

<S%G1161><s%> above <S%G4253><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> being <S%G2192><s%> fervent <S%G1618><s%> in your love <S%G26><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>; for <S%G3754><s%> love <S%G26><s%> covereth <S%G2572><s%> a multitude <S%G4128><s%> of sins <S%G266><s%>:
using hospitality <S%G5382><s%> one <S%G240><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> another <S%G240><s%> without <S%G427><s%> murmuring <S%G1112><s%>:

according as <S%G2531><s%> each <S%G1538><s%> hath received <S%G2983><s%> a gift <S%G5486><s%>, ministering <S%G1247><s%> it <S%G846><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> yourselves <S%G1438><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> stewards <S%G3623><s%> of the manifold <S%G4164><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>;

if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> speaketh <S%G2980><s%>, speaking as <S%G5613><s%> it were oracles <S%G3051><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>; if <S%G1487><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> ministereth <S%G1247><s%>, ministering as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the strength <S%G2479><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> supplieth <S%G5524><s%>: that <S%G2443><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> may be glorified <S%G1392><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, whose <S%G3739><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dominion <S%G2904><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> ever <S%G165><s%> and ever <S%G165><s%>. Amen <S%G281><s%>.

Beloved <S%G27><s%>, think it <S%G3579><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> strange <S%G3579><s%> concerning <S%G5213><s%> the fiery trial <S%G4451><s%> among you <S%G1722><s%>, which cometh upon you <S%G5213><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> prove <S%G3986><s%> you <S%G5213><s%>, as though a strange thing <S%G3581><s%> happened <S%G4819><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> insomuch as <S%G2526><s%> ye are partakers <S%G2841><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>'s sufferings <S%G3804><s%>, rejoice <S%G5463><s%>; that <S%G2443><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the revelation <S%G602><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> ye may rejoice <S%G5463><s%> with exceeding joy <S%G21><s%>.

If <S%G1487><s%> ye are reproached <S%G3679><s%> for <S%G1722><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, blessed <S%G3107><s%> are ye <S%G3754><s%>; because the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of <S%G987><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Spirit of God <S%G2316><s%> resteth <S%G373><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> let <S%G3958><s%> none <S%G3361><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%> suffer <S%G3958><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a <S%G5100><s%> murderer <S%G5406><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> a thief <S%G2812><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> an evil-doer <S%G2555><s%>, or <S%G2228><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a meddler in other men <S%G244><s%>'s matters:

but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a man suffer as <S%G5613><s%> a Christian <S%G5546><s%>, let him <S%G153><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> be ashamed <S%G153><s%>; but <S%G1161><s%> let him glorify <S%G1392><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> name <S%G3313><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> is come for judgment <S%G2917><s%> to begin <S%G756><s%> at <S%G575><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it begin first <S%G4412><s%> at <S%G575><s%> us <S%G2257><s%>, what <S%G5101><s%> shall be the end <S%G5056><s%> of them that obey not <S%G544><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the righteous <S%G1342><s%> is scarcely <S%G3433><s%> saved <S%G4982><s%>, where <S%G4226><s%> shall <S%G5316><s%> the ungodly <S%G765><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sinner <S%G268><s%> appear <S%G5316><s%>?

Wherefore <S%G5620><s%> let them also that suffer <S%G3958><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> commit <S%G3908><s%> their <S%G1438><s%> souls <S%G5590><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> well-doing <S%G16><s%> unto <S%G5613><s%> a faithful <S%G4103><s%> Creator <S%G2939><s%>.
